original: // / sdom la /
analyzed: // / sdom la /

analyzed: srog chags bcas dang nyal sar 'dug /'greng dang gcer bu dmag dang ni //

analyzed: bcu pa lnga pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /

translated: Using water containing living beings, sitting in the house of a couple preparing to have sexual intercourse, standing in the house of a couple preparing to have sexual intercourse, giving to a naked ascetic, watching an army, staying with an army,

analyzed: dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong ba dang / rdeg pa dang / gzas pa dang / gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed do //

analyzed: de la srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das koo sh'amb'i na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying at the Kūṭāgāraśālā in the city of Kauśāmbī.

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod nas /

analyzed: de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa khyod shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la ma spyod cig / des smras pa /

analyzed: kho bo la 'ga' zhig gis bsgrangs te gtad dam ci / shar gyi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong na ci nyes /

analyzed: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod ces smod par byed / phyar ka gtong bar byed / kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to ;

analyzed: / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
translated: They reported the matter to the Blessed One.🔽The Blessed One decreed, “Monks, you should not knowingly use water that has living beings in it.

original: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod na ltung byed do zhes bca' pa mdzad de /
analyzed: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod na ltung byed do zhes bca' pa mdzad de /

original: yul ni koo sh'amb'i /
analyzed: yul ni koo sh'amb'i /

original: gang zag ni 'dun pa /
analyzed: gang zag ni 'dun pa /

analyzed: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /

analyzed: srog chags dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: chu la spyod na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “In water” means

analyzed: chu'i spyod pa gnyis su ste /

analyzed: nang gi dang phyi rol gyi'o //

analyzed: phyi rol gyi spyod pa ni /

original: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
analyzed: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
translated: They invited the Blessed One, together with the community of monks,

original: sang bdag cag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes spyan drangs nas gnang ba dang / k'ara sh'a pa na dag khyer te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gan du song nas smras pa /
analyzed: sang bdag cag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes spyan drangs nas gnang ba dang / k'ara sh'a pa na dag khyer te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gan du song nas smras pa /
translated: to take their meal the next day, and the Blessed One assented. They took some gold coins and went to Venerable Ānanda, saying,

original: btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag cag la snod spyad dang / mi blas dang gnas mal gyi 'byor pa ma mchis kyis /
analyzed: btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag cag la snod spyad dang / mi blas dang gnas mal gyi 'byor pa ma mchis kyis /
translated: “Venerable Ānanda, we do not have the means to provide you with vessels, servants, or bedding.

original: khyed kyis kyang k'arash'a pa na 'di dag gis zhal zas sta gon bgyid du stsol cig dang / bdag cag mchis te brim par bgyi'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis kyang k'arash'a pa na 'di dag gis zhal zas sta gon bgyid du stsol cig dang / bdag cag mchis te brim par bgyi'o //
translated: You should also prepare a meal with these kārṣāpaṇas, and we will come and serve it.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la /
translated: The venerable Ānanda said to the householder Anāthapiṇḍada,

original: khyim bdag khyod kyis 'di dag dang bdag nyid kyi k'ara sh'a pa na gzhan dag bsres te /
analyzed: khyim bdag khyod kyis 'di dag dang bdag nyid kyi k'ara sh'a pa na gzhan dag bsres te /
translated: “Householder, you should mix these kārṣāpaṇas with your own and

original: zhal zas bsod pa sta gon gyis la 'dir skur cig ces smras so //
analyzed: zhal zas bsod pa sta gon gyis la 'dir skur cig ces smras so //
translated: prepare a delicious meal and send it here.”

original: de ltar byas nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro //
translated: Having done so, he sent it to the Jeta Grove.

original: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
translated: The venerable Ānanda

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la zhal zas sta gon byas kyis tshur sheg la /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la zhal zas sta gon byas kyis tshur sheg la /
translated: sent a message to those sons and daughters of good family, saying, “The meal is prepared. Come and🔽serve it to the Buddha and the community of monks.”

original: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la brims shig ces spring ba dang / de dag lhags te smras pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la brims shig ces spring ba dang / de dag lhags te smras pa /
translated: They came and said,

original: btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags kyis /
analyzed: btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags kyis /
translated: “Venerable Ānanda, you are our spiritual friend.

original: tshur spyon khyod kyis kyang brim du gsol /
analyzed: tshur spyon khyod kyis kyang brim du gsol /
translated: Please come and serve it yourself.

original: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos brim par brtsams pa dang / der gcer bu ma rgan gzhon gnyis shig 'ongs te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos brim par brtsams pa dang / der gcer bu ma rgan gzhon gnyis shig 'ongs te /
translated: The venerable Ānanda began to serve it, and two naked ascetics, one old and one young, came there.

original: de gnyis kyis khyim bdag mo de dag la zan bslangs pa na /
analyzed: de gnyis kyis khyim bdag mo de dag la zan bslangs pa na /
translated: When they begged the ladies of the house for food,

original: de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: de dag gis smras pa /
translated: they said,

original: zas 'di ni rgyal bu 'di'i yin no //
analyzed: zas 'di ni rgyal bu 'di'i yin no //
translated: This food is for the prince.

original: gcer bu ma de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bslangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ma bsams par brims pa na /
analyzed: gcer bu ma de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bslangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ma bsams par brims pa na /
translated: The two naked ascetics asked the venerable Ānanda, and without thinking, the venerable Ānanda served it.

original: rgan mo la ni khur ba gcig byin /
analyzed: rgan mo la ni khur ba gcig byin /
translated: He gave one cake to the old woman,

original: gzhon nu ma la ni khur ba gnyis sbyin nas /🔽rgan @172a * //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma la ni khur ba gnyis sbyin nas / rgan @172a * //
translated: and two cakes to the young woman.

original: mos smras pa /
analyzed: mos smras pa /
translated: The old woman said,

original: gzhon nu ma rgyal bu 'dis khyod don du gnyer gyis /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma rgyal bu 'dis khyod don du gnyer gyis /
translated: Young woman, this prince is after you.

original: sta gon gyis shig ces zer nas /
analyzed: sta gon gyis shig ces zer nas /
translated: Prepare yourself.

original: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag / gcer bu pa dang gcer bu ma kun du rgyu dang / kun du rgyu ma la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba sbyin par byed ces smod par byed /🔽phyar ka gtong bar byed /
analyzed: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag / gcer bu pa dang gcer bu ma kun du rgyu dang / kun du rgyu ma la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba sbyin par byed ces smod par byed / phyar ka gtong bar byed /
translated: “Why, monks, do you give food with your own hands to naked ascetics and to naked ascetic women?”

original: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
translated: They criticized and complained and spread it about.

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: The monks reported the matter to the Blessed One.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /🔽yang dge slong gang gce bu pa'am /🔽gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am /🔽kun du rgyu mo la /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du / yang dge slong gang gce bu pa'am / gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am / kun du rgyu mo la /
translated: Then the Blessed One, as in the previous story,

original: rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba sbyin par byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba sbyin par byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
translated: “If a monk gives food with his own hands to a naked ascetic or a naked ascetic woman, he commits an offense entailing confession.”

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The place was Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo //
analyzed: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo //
translated: The person was Venerable Ānanda.

original: nyon mongs pa ni ma brtags par spyod pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni ma brtags par spyod pa /
translated: The affliction was not examining.

original: nyes pa ni gcer bu ma la rang gi lag nas zan sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa ni gcer bu ma la rang gi lag nas zan sbyin pa'o //
translated: The offense was giving food with his own hands to a naked ascetic woman.

original: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di ba'o //
analyzed: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di ba'o //
translated: Here, a monk means one who is a follower of this doctrine.

original: gcer bu pa'am gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am kun du rgyu mo la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gcer bu pa'am gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am kun du rgyu mo la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: A naked ascetic or a female naked ascetic means

original: rtags 'di dang rab tu byung ba 'di med pa la'o //
analyzed: rtags 'di dang rab tu byung ba 'di med pa la'o //
translated: one who does not have these signs of a renunciate.🔽With his own hand means

original: rang gi lag nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang gi lag nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: with his own hand.
